data.name: MAGICAL DEATHPAIR
data.detailed_description:
Can you swear you won't betray me?


MAGICAL DEATHPAIR is an adventure game that sixteen witches are find themselves in a game of life and death.


Warning: This game contains scenes of explicit gore and sexual content.

STORY

It is November 2020 in a world where witches secretly protect Tokyo's peace.
A sudden monster appearance causes a huge rise in missing persons.
Sixteen of the best witches are sent out to deal with the problem and find themselves in a game of life and death.

Note: You can play the first chapter in this Steam version.


MAGICAL DEATHPAIR Art Book

You can enjoy the game creator yatsunagi's artwork and commentary on MAGICAL DEATHPAIR.
(PDF data / Included in the game folder)

MAGICAL DEATHPAIR Art Book (PDF / 40 pages)

About the second chapter

The second chapter of the game are currently being created by the game creator, yatsunagi san, but as the game is being created by alone
As for the release of the second chapter, we will announce it on Steam News when we can.

data.short_description: 16 Witches, 8 Couples, Game to escape death... Hunt down the Imposter. Save the world from impending catastrophe. Life and death adventure game for those who love charming witches.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is made with RPG Maker MV（Nwjs/HTML5）.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 3.30GHz or better
  • Graphics: Intel HD 615Graphics or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Graphics involving physical injuries are included in the story to depict the tragic end of some characters.

Mild sexual content is present, including descriptions of kissing and embracing scenes.
